function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of interdisciplinary work in addressing human, animal, and environmental factors","Impact":"Limited understanding of socio-ecological systems and potential risk factors for disease propagation","Mitigation":"Encourage interdisciplinary collaboration, knowledge sharing, and funding for research in One Health approach","Technologies":"Collaborative research platforms, data sharing tools, and virtual conferencing technologies","People":"Researchers, environmentalists, public health professionals","Owner":"Research institutions, funding agencies"},{"Description":"Limited studies comparing human use and biodiversity conservation in green spaces","Impact":"Lack of evidence-based solutions for balancing human use and biodiversity conservation, which may contribute to disease propagation","Mitigation":"Funding for comparative studies, promotion of research on sustainable use of green spaces, and stakeholder engagement","Technologies":"Environmental monitoring tools, GIS mapping, data analysis software","People":"Researchers, conservationists, urban planners","Owner":"Funding agencies, research institutions"},{"Description":"Focus on the effect of biodiversity on human health rather than considering both dimensions simultaneously","Impact":"Missed opportunities to identify synergies and trade-offs in environmental and socioeconomic conditions, leading to potential risks for disease transmission","Mitigation":"Encourage integrated research approaches, funding for interdisciplinary studies, and promotion of cross-disciplinary collaborations","Technologies":"Integrated modeling tools, data integration platforms, multi-dimensional analysis software","People":"Researchers, public health professionals, environmentalists","Owner":"Funding agencies, research institutions"}]}
